declarations.comments:
This is the top level big dog of a function, as such
We provide the big Stylesheet doing-things-lump
a function from props -> Styles
some props
and we get back a bunch of CSSSelectors (classes)
declarations.title: addStyle

declarations.comments:
This takes an item and returns the selector and declaration text
Useful for diffing etc
declarations.title: unpackRule

declarations.comments: Insert new rule into stylesheet, deleting old one if name matches
declarations.title: insertRule

declarations.comments: Gets style rules for a rule list and fetches basic data about them
declarations.title: getUnpackedStyleRules

declarations.comments: Get the selector text of a CSSStyleRule
declarations.title: getStyleRuleSelectorText

declarations.comments: Get the Style Declaration of a CSSStyleRule
declarations.title: getStyleRuleDeclarationText

declarations.comments: Get the rule from the Media Rule
declarations.title: getMediaRuleMediaText

declarations.comments: Get all the rules of a stylesheet, split by type
declarations.title: getFilteredRuleList

declarations.comments:
This commits the rendered StyleRuleSet into InsertMediaRules that we can
store and apply to the CSSOM
declarations.title: keep

declarations.comments:
Get the generated CSS classes from the CSS. These are generated from
hashes of the content
declarations.title: getClasses

declarations.comments: This creates a unique hash of the CSS that we'll use to make the classname
declarations.title: createHashedInsertRule

declarations.comments: CSSRuleSet is what we build up for a style
declarations.title: CSSRuleSet

declarations.comments: Create a rule that takes no props
declarations.title: str

declarations.comments: Create a media query
declarations.title: media

declarations.comments: Create a rule that receives the props
declarations.title: fun

declarations.comments: Unique ID for stylesheet in DOM
declarations.title: StylesheetId

declarations.comments: Description of media query
declarations.title: MediaQueryText

declarations.comments: Data structure used internally to describe a single CSS rule
declarations.title: InsertRule

declarations.comments: A complete single rule or nested media rule
declarations.title: InsertMediaRule

declarations.comments: CSS rules in text form
declarations.title: CSSText

declarations.comments: CSS Selectors used in DOM, currently we only use class selectors
declarations.title: CSSSelector

declarations.comments:
Create a StyleSheet in the DOM along with an empty
VirtualStylesheet to record it's contents
declarations.title: createBlankStylesheet
